ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Fighter armor and weapons at low level
ygData.msgSnippet: I think damage dealt by each and aggro is figured by when the DS is cast, and I was always told that if at all possible the DS should be cast before the newbie
ygData.messageBody:
I think damage dealt by each and aggro is figured by when the DS is cast, and I was always told that if at all possible the DS should be cast before the newbie makes the first attack and/or gets aggroed.
----- Original Message -----
From: Nygaardr, FC3
To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
Sent: Wednesday, August 29, 2001 6:38 AM
Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Re: Fighter armor and weapons at low level

"Just wait to cast after combat starts, or make sure the low-level
initiates combat (This of course depends on zone/mobs)."

This is clueless. Was not referring to you.

Mu

From: Thomas H. Comegys [mailto:comegys@...]
